# MG1StationaryProbability
The goal of MG1StationaryProbability is to automate computations of stationary probability and derived indecies for M/G/1 queuing system with alternating Poisson flow of arrivals.

## Installation

You can install the development version of MG1StationaryProbability from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("MashroomMole/MG1StationaryProbability")
```
